title: Lowest Permanent Cropland
description: In 2022, only 0.003% of Mongolia's land area was used as permanent cropland, one of the lowest percentages globally.

title: Lowest Net Acquisition of Financial Assets
description: In 2021, Mongolia had a net acquisition of financial assets at -6.44% of GDP, indicating a significant financial asset reduction.

title: Lowest Tuberculosis Case Detection Rate
description: In 2023, Mongolia's tuberculosis case detection rate was only 18%, one of the lowest in the world.

title: Highest Merchandise Exports to East Asia & Pacific
description: In 2023, 91.71% of Mongolia's total merchandise exports were to low- and middle-income economies in East Asia & Pacific, the highest percentage globally.
